properties.entry: SELECT A.DELIVERY_NO , A.DELIVERY_TYPE , A.TRANSIT_NO , A.TRANSIT_DATE , B.ORDER_NO , B.ORDER_MEMBER_NO , B.ORDER_DATE , B.ORDER_TITLE , B.AMOUNT_PRICE FROM MG_ORDER_DELIVERY A JOIN MG_ORDER B ON (A.DELIVERY_NO = B.ORDER_NO) WHERE A.DELIVERY_NO = ?

SELECT A.RNUM , A.PAYMENT_NO , A.PAYMENT_ORDER_NO , A.PAYMENT_MEMBER_NO , A.FINAL_PAYMENT_PRICE , A.USED_POINT , A.PAYMENT_STATUS , A.PAYMENT_DATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.PAYMENT_NO , B.PAYMENT_ORDER_NO , B.PAYMENT_MEMBER_NO , B.FINAL_PAYMENT_PRICE , B.USED_POINT , B.PAYMENT_STATUS , B.PAYMENT_DATE FROM (SELECT A.PAYMENT_NO , A.PAYMENT_ORDER_NO , A.PAYMENT_MEMBER_NO , A.FINAL_PAYMENT_PRICE , A.USED_POINT , A.PAYMENT_STATUS , A.PAYMENT_DATE FROM MG_PAYMENT A JOIN MG_ORDER B ON (A.PAYMENT_ORDER_NO = B.ORDER_NO) ORDER BY A.PAYMENT_NO DESC ) B ) A WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE MG_ORDER_DELIVERY A SET A.DELIVERY_TYPE = ?, A.TRANSIT_NO = ? WHERE A.DELIVERY_NO = ? AND A.TRANSIT_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MG_PAYMENT A WHERE A.PAYMENT_NO LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MG_PAYMENT A WHERE A.PAYMENT_MEMBER_NO LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MG_PAYMENT A WHERE A.PAYMENT_ORDER_NO LIKE '%' || ? || '%'

SELECT A.RNUM , A.PAYMENT_NO , A.PAYMENT_ORDER_NO , A.PAYMENT_MEMBER_NO , A.FINAL_PAYMENT_PRICE , A.USED_POINT , A.PAYMENT_STATUS , A.PAYMENT_DATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.PAYMENT_NO , B.PAYMENT_ORDER_NO , B.PAYMENT_MEMBER_NO , B.FINAL_PAYMENT_PRICE , B.USED_POINT , B.PAYMENT_STATUS , B.PAYMENT_DATE FROM (SELECT A.PAYMENT_NO , A.PAYMENT_ORDER_NO , A.PAYMENT_MEMBER_NO , A.FINAL_PAYMENT_PRICE , A.USED_POINT , A.PAYMENT_STATUS , A.PAYMENT_DATE FROM MG_PAYMENT A JOIN MG_ORDER B ON (A.PAYMENT_ORDER_NO = B.ORDER_NO) WHERE A.PAYMENT_NO LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ORDER BY A.PAYMENT_NO DESC ) B ) A WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT A.RNUM , A.PAYMENT_NO , A.PAYMENT_ORDER_NO , A.PAYMENT_MEMBER_NO , A.FINAL_PAYMENT_PRICE , A.USED_POINT , A.PAYMENT_STATUS , A.PAYMENT_DATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.PAYMENT_NO , B.PAYMENT_ORDER_NO , B.PAYMENT_MEMBER_NO , B.FINAL_PAYMENT_PRICE , B.USED_POINT , B.PAYMENT_STATUS , B.PAYMENT_DATE FROM (SELECT A.PAYMENT_NO , A.PAYMENT_ORDER_NO , A.PAYMENT_MEMBER_NO , A.FINAL_PAYMENT_PRICE , A.USED_POINT , A.PAYMENT_STATUS , A.PAYMENT_DATE FROM MG_PAYMENT A JOIN MG_ORDER B ON (A.PAYMENT_ORDER_NO = B.ORDER_NO) WHERE A.PAYMENT_MEMBER_NO LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ORDER BY A.PAYMENT_NO DESC ) B ) A WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT A.RNUM , A.PAYMENT_NO , A.PAYMENT_ORDER_NO , A.PAYMENT_MEMBER_NO , A.FINAL_PAYMENT_PRICE , A.USED_POINT , A.PAYMENT_STATUS , A.PAYMENT_DATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.PAYMENT_NO , B.PAYMENT_ORDER_NO , B.PAYMENT_MEMBER_NO , B.FINAL_PAYMENT_PRICE , B.USED_POINT , B.PAYMENT_STATUS , B.PAYMENT_DATE FROM (SELECT A.PAYMENT_NO , A.PAYMENT_ORDER_NO , A.PAYMENT_MEMBER_NO , A.FINAL_PAYMENT_PRICE , A.USED_POINT , A.PAYMENT_STATUS , A.PAYMENT_DATE FROM MG_PAYMENT A JOIN MG_ORDER B ON (A.PAYMENT_ORDER_NO = B.ORDER_NO) WHERE A.PAYMENT_ORDER_NO LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ORDER BY A.PAYMENT_NO DESC ) B ) A WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT A.PAYMENT_NO , A.PAYMENT_ORDER_NO , A.PAYMENT_MEMBER_NO , A.FINAL_PAYMENT_PRICE , A.USED_POINT , A.PAYMENT_STATUS , A.PAYMENT_DATE , C.MEMBER_NAME , C.MEMBER_PNO , C.MEMBER_STATUS , C.EMAIL , C.MEMBER_POINT FROM MG_PAYMENT A JOIN MG_ORDER B ON (A.PAYMENT_ORDER_NO = B.ORDER_NO) JOIN MG_MEMBER C ON (A.PAYMENT_MEMBER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO) WHERE A.PAYMENT_NO = ?
